did.head: Collection Summary
did.unittitle: Oral History Interview: St. Michael's, Ariz., with Bernard Fontana 1960
did.abstract: Typescript of tape recording; recounts events of his family life and association with Native Americans, government officials, anthropologists, missionaries, and other traders.

prefercite.head: Credit Line
prefercite.p: Oral History Interview: St. Michael's, Ariz., with Bernard Fontana (AZ 350). Special Collections, University of Arizona Libraries.

bioghist.head: Biographical Note
bioghist.p: Pioneer, and trading post operator; Navajo Indian Reservation.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: This collection is organized into narrative sequence.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Note
scopecontent.p: Typescript of tape recording; recounts events of his family life and association with Native Americans, government officials, anthropologists, missionaries, and other traders.

relatedmaterial.p: Audio tape of interview is at University of Arizona Library, Media Center, Audio-Tape 288, Reels 1-3. 545 Pioneer, and trading post operator; Navajo Indian Reservation.
